switch.name: /systems/fbw/protections/alpha
switch.test: position/wow eq 1 /it-fbw/law ne 0 /systems/fbw/protections/alpha-input le /systems/fbw/protections/alpha-prot-d /systems/fbw/pitch/e-i-n ge 0.5 position/gear-agl-ft le 100

switch.name: /systems/fbw/protections/overspeed
switch.test: position/wow eq 1 /it-fbw/law ne 0 /systems/fbw/protections/alpha eq 1 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt le /FMGC/internal/vmo-mmo aero/alpha-deg-damped ge /systems/fbw/alpha-prot-deg

pid.name: /systems/fbw/pitch/vc-kts-rate
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of IAS

switch.name: /systems/fbw/pitch/flare-active
switch.test: /systems/fbw/fmgc/enabled eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft le 30 /controls/flight/flaps-pos ge 4 /FMGC/internal/to-state eq 0 /it-fbw/law eq 0 gear/unit[0]/WOW eq 0 /systems/fbw/detent-1-feedback le 2 /systems/fbw/detent-2-feedback le 2 /systems/fadec/eng-out ne 1

/systems/fbw/fmgc/enabled eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft le 30 /controls/flight/flaps-pos ge 4 /FMGC/internal/to-state eq 0 /it-fbw/law eq 0 gear/unit[0]/WOW eq 0 /systems/fbw/detent-1-feedback le 4 /systems/fbw/detent-2-feedback le 4 /systems/fadec/eng-out eq 1

switch.name: /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-up-limit
switch.test: /systems/fbw/protections/alpha eq 1 /systems/fbw/pitch/load-factor gt 1.25 attitude/roll-rad lt -0.5846853 attitude/roll-rad gt 0.5846853

switch.name: /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-switch
switch.test: /systems/fbw/pitch/gain-switch eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-height attitude/roll-rad lt 0.628319 attitude/roll-rad gt -0.628319 /systems/fbw/pitch/stabilizer-enabled eq 1 /systems/fbw/pitch/out-of-trim eq 1 /systems/fbw/pitch/pid-switched gt 0.001 /systems/fbw/pitch/load-factor ge 0.5 /systems/fbw/protections/overspeed ne 1 position/wow eq 0 /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-dn-limit eq 0 /controls/flight/elevator-trim le /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-dn

/systems/fbw/pitch/gain-switch eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-height attitude/roll-rad lt 0.628319 attitude/roll-rad gt -0.628319 /systems/fbw/pitch/stabilizer-enabled eq 1 /systems/fbw/pitch/out-of-trim eq 1 /systems/fbw/pitch/pid-switched lt -0.001 /systems/fbw/pitch/load-factor ge 0.5 /systems/fbw/protections/overspeed ne 1 position/wow eq 0 /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-up-limit eq 0 /controls/flight/elevator-trim ge /systems/fbw/pitch/autotrim-up

switch.name: /systems/fctl/fac1-rtlu-avail
switch.test:
/systems/failures/fctl/rtlu-1 eq 0 /systems/electrical/bus/dc-ess ge 25 /systems/fctl/fac1-healthy-signal eq 1
/systems/fmgc/cas-compare/cas-reject-1 eq 0 /systems/navigation/adr/operating-1 eq 1
/systems/fmgc/cas-compare/cas-reject-3 eq 0 /systems/navigation/adr/operating-3 eq 1

switch.name: /systems/fctl/fac2-rtlu-avail
switch.test:
/systems/failures/fctl/rtlu-2 eq 0 /systems/electrical/bus/dc-2 ge 25 /systems/fctl/fac2-healthy-signal eq 1
/systems/fmgc/cas-compare/cas-reject-2 eq 0 /systems/navigation/adr/operating-2 eq 1
/systems/fmgc/cas-compare/cas-reject-3 eq 0 /systems/navigation/adr/operating-3 eq 1

switch.name: /systems/fbw/yaw/rtlu-power
switch.test: /systems/electrical/bus/ac-ess-26v ge 24.8 /systems/fctl/fac1-rtlu-avail eq 0 /systems/fctl/fac2-rtlu-avail eq 0 fcs/slat-pos-deg ne 0 /systems/fbw/yaw/max-deg-switch ne /systems/fbw/yaw/max-deg-switch-cmd
